SQL_STMT_U.val: select BNKA_BANK_ADMNO, BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO, BNKA_BANKID, BNKA_BANKACCOUNT, min(CLBD310_BANKID), min(CLBD310_BANKACCOUNT) from :1/BNKA, :1/CLBD where BNKA_BANK_ADMNO = :2 and BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO = :3 and BNKA_ADMNO1 > 0 and CLBD310_ADMNO = BNKA_ADMNO1 and CLBD310_CLNTNO = BNKA_CLNTNO1 and CLBD310_BANKACCOUNT <> BNKA_BANKACCOUNT and CLBD310_BANKACCOUNT like '%'||trim(BNKA_BANKACCOUNT)||'%' group by BNKA_BANK_ADMNO, BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO, BNKA_BANKID, BNKA_BANKACCOUNT order by BNKA_BANK_ADMNO, BNKA_BANK_LEDG_NO, BNKA_BANKID, BNKA_BANKACCOUNT for fetch only
